title: You Know What You Did
description: Amanda Roberts appears to have it all. The only child of prosperous, supportive middle-class parents, she married her first serious boyfriend, successful multi-millionaire businessman Jack Roberts, and has two beautiful children with him, Elsie and Nat. Additionally, she has her own career as a successful and best-selling author.But now someone is upset with her; badly. And someone is out for revenge.
author: Laura Lyndhurst
